member.name: M:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Controllers.UsersController.UpdateCharacterMeshAndHair(PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.UpdateCharacterMeshRequest)
member.remarks: Updates cosmetic character data by Name and requires valid user session guid.
member.param:
CustomerGUID - This is the API key.
UserSessionGUID - This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains CharacterName we need to update.
CharacterName - This is the name of the character to update.
CosmeticCharacterData - This is the cosmetic character data we need to update.

member.name: P:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.GetCosmeticCharacterDataRequest.UserSessionGUID
member.remarks: This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains CharacterName we need to update.

member.name: P:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.GetCosmeticCharacterDataRequest.CharacterName
member.remarks: This is the name of the character to get Custom Data fields for.

member.name: P:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.UpdateCharacterMeshRequest.UserSessionGUID
member.remarks: This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains CharacterName we need to update.

member.name: P:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.UpdateCharacterMeshRequest.CharacterName
member.remarks: This is the name of the character to update.

member.name: P:PirateRoyaltyPublicApi.Requests.Users.UpdateCharacterMeshRequest.CosmeticCharacterData
